com.sessionm.api
Interface ActivityListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseActivity
public interface ActivityListener

Session M UI activity listener interface.

This listener interface can be use in two ways:
1. Application can register object implementing this interface using SessionM.setActivityListener(ActivityListener).
2. Application activities can implement this interface (or extend BaseActivity). Note that only currently running activity, i.e. that last called SessionM.onActivityResume(android.app.Activity) will receive this listener callbacks.

Method Summary
 void onDismissed(SessionM instance)
          Provides notifications that a SessionM activity has been dismissed.

          Provides notifications that a SessionM activity has been presented.

onDismissed

Parameters:

onUnavailable

void onUnavailable(SessionM instance)
Provides notifications that a SessionM activity previously requested with the SessionM.presentActivity(com.sessionm.api.SessionM.ActivityType, Object...) method call is not available for display. This may happen in the following circumstances among others:
  • Achievement is attempted to be displayed but no new achievement is available.
  • Network is not available (applicable for achievements only).
  • Another SessionM UI activity is currently presented.
  • No application Activity is in running state. See SessionM.onActivityResume(android.app.Activity) and other Activity life-cycle notifications for more details.

Parameters:
instance - SessionM instance

shouldAutopresentActivity

boolean shouldAutopresentActivity(SessionM instance)
Asks application if achievement activity should be auto-presented. This method is invoked each time a new achievement has been earned as a result of SessionM.logAction(String) call to determine if achievement UI activity should be presented. The value returned by this method takes precedence over SessionM.isAutopresentMode() setting.

Parameters:
instance - SessionM instance
Returns:
boolean indicating if achievement activity should be auto-presented
